meanings.definition: The standard of something as measured against other things of a similar kind; the degree of excellence.
meanings.sent1: Her painting exhibited a high quality, showing great skill and beauty.
meanings.sent2: The quality of the fabric was exceptional, lasting for many years without fading.
meanings.sent3: The quality of the joke made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his work was of such quality that it shone brighter than any other.
meanings.sent5: The quality of her voice was so pure and melodious that it enchanted all who heard it.

meanings.definition: A distinctive attribute or characteristic possessed by someone or something.
meanings.sent1: His kindness was a quality that endeared him to everyone he met.
meanings.sent2: The dog's loyalty was a quality that made it a beloved companion.
meanings.sent3: The quality of her determination was unmatched, driving her to achieve her goals.
meanings.sent4: The quality of the gemstone sparkled with a brilliance that caught everyone's eye.
meanings.sent5: The quality of his leadership was evident in the success of the team under his guidance.

meanings.definition: The standard of something as measured against other things of a similar kind; the degree of excellence.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant prided itself on the quality of its ingredients, sourcing only the freshest produce.
meanings.sent2: The quality of his workmanship was evident in the intricate details of the sculpture.
meanings.sent3: The quality of the performance left the audience in awe of the talent on display.
meanings.sent4: The quality of her writing transported readers to magical worlds beyond imagination.
meanings.sent5: The quality of the sunset painted the sky in hues of gold and pink, a breathtaking sight to behold.
